name: Denny Campbell
text: Dr. Lowe is the most caring Dr. that I've been to been a patient since 2013. And his wife is the sweetest and always smiling.

name: Jo Reed
text: I love Dr. Lowe and Deb!  The entire staff is so caring and have your best interest at heart

name: Sam Roberts
text: Dr. Lowe and his staff do an outstanding job. I’m very pleased as a new patient; with his care and concern to help me live the best life I can.

name: Samantha Colvin
text: Dr. Lowe and his staff are amazing!!! He actually cares about his patients, unlike alot of doctors in this town. He takes time to go over everything with you, and make sure you understand. He answers all your questions! Love them!!!

name: Dyllon Dodd
text:
Dr. Lowe is great, he was very strict on me starting out as an addict, but he also gave me ample time to get adjusted & take the medicine correctly. I’ve heard horror stories about other addiction specialists kicking patients out for minor offenses. Addiction is a terrible plague on ones life that not only effects them, but equally effects their family & friends. Drs should be understanding & little more enduring with patients dealing with addiction.
I assure you that Dr.Lowe is the person you’re looking for if struggling with addiction, him & his staff have always treated me kindly.

name: Mark Osborne
text: Eight patience outside at 0846 that have been here since before 0830. Suppose to open at 0830 bu staff cant open up on time.

name: Amber Hightower
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Lowe and Deb for 10 years. I have always been treated like a person and not a number. Thankful for the whole office.

name: Brandy Lockwood
text: Dr. Lowe has always been straight up and straight forward with what he expects from you as a patient.. I've been going to see him since 2013 and he truly cares about my sobriety!!!

name: Jimmy Slusmeyer
text: Excellent service and care.

text: I have been going to dr. Courtney Lowe's office for quite a few years they've always went out of their way and to help and work with you and I wouldn't consider going anywhere else

name: Lynn Marshall
text: Dr. Lowe is great!

text: Doctor Nazareno is very thorough and personal. It is hard to find a doctor with her kind of work ethic these days. If she says she will do it, she will. The staff is always nice to me too. Very awesome!

text: Good place for medical emergency

name: Theron G
text: And she is a Bi---

name: john bass
text: THEY WON'T ANSWER THE PHONE LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Telimea Sanders
text: My daughter started off going to the Bel Air Mall location the staff was wonderful. We changed locations due to us moving and for convenience.  The worst decision I ever made. The Schillinger Rd. Semmes location.  The Doctor is Awesome and the front desk staff is horrible unprofessional.  I would call in to make appointments and would be left on hold entirely too long .I would try calling back and speak with someone and the girl would have a attitude.  I left word to speak to a clinical manager never received a call back.. I called for weeks about my daughter's retainer and I have yet to get a response or the retainer that was paid for in advance..every time I call im left on hold. They really need to change office staff or send them back through customer service training and discuss professionalism with them.

name: Thomas Gardner
text: My wife and I had our annual eye exam today and Sarah was just wonderful. And as always Dr. Perry was a pleasure to have as an eye doctor been going to her for years will not go see anyone else!!! Thank you Sarah and Dr. Perry for the great office visit today.

name: Teresa Henderson
text: The staff made me feel real welcome and most importantly, comfortable with my visit. I would recommend Mobile Bay to any of my friends and family (and I already have)!

name: Trenton Hughes
text: I've been trying to get an appointment to install a tooth on my implant for two weeks now. Every time I call to schedule they tell me they will call me back and i have yet to hear from someone.  No one seems to know the proper steps or protocol to schedule me an appointment. Staff needs better knowledge of what's going on. I've been a patient with Mobile Bay Dental for over 15 years. I'm left with no choice but to find another Dentist office. Smh!!!!

name: Brenda Love
text: They are awesome.Always have a great experience when I come here. Christy is the best.

name: Marie Pocase
text: The hygenist Kristy is awesome. She didn't lower me to the floor but let me sit at a comfortable setting. She is very caring & attentive to my needs. I highly recommend her.

name: Jessica M.
text: My family has been coming to this location for 6 years and it has always been a wonderful experience! The staff are very friendly and always willing to make the client feels comfortable and cared for. Our hygienist, Kristy, is absolutely AMAZING. She is very thorough, knowledgeable, and precise.

name: India Hope
text: This was my first visit and Kristy took care of me. Very fast and very attentive. Made me feel more than comfortable just with her warm smile!

name: Bobby Carter
text:
Kristy she was great it was the best dentist visit ever!!
So professional and polite experience.  I will be back for more visits!!!!

name: JANICE KIDD
text: Hey I had a great 👍visit with the dentist and hygienist Kristy she is a wonderful and pleasant person to have a a hygienist Thank you so much.

name: Tanya Powell
text: What’s the purpose in having an appointment?? They send out a message saying be here on time and no later but yet we’ve been here for 45 minutes and people that came in after us have already been seen and left. I’ve never in my life been looked at as our time means nothing. Get with the program!! STOP over scheduling if you can’t see patients on time.

name: PJ Willis-Jackson
text: The best dental experience ever ! My hygienist Kristy is awesome! No long wait time, cater my every need and concerns.Friendly staff and calm atmosphere. Top notch Dentist who explain procedures thoroughly

name: Tiffany F
text: I give my overall experience 5 stars from the ladies at the front desk to the ladies in the back but, Christy the hygienist does an excellent job. She shows a passion for what she does. She goes above and beyond to make sure her patients are comfortable.

name: Eula McClain
text: Had a very pleasant visit with Krisity the hygienist  she had an awesome personality and did a great job, also front staff was very nice as well!

name: BriAnna Gardner
text: If I could give this place a ZERO, I really would! I had 2 extractions done for my wisdom teeth on last week and I’m so happy that I was late or it would have been 4! I couldn’t imagine having 4 teeth pulled because this place sent me home with NO ANTIBIOTICS. Only pain pills! I noticed that the pain was beginning to be a bit unbearable so I called and ask if it was normal and if I could come in. The RECEPTIONIST proceeds to tell me that everything was normal. She’s not a dentist so I called back to schedule an appointment to come in. My appointment was at 4:00. I didn’t even make it to the back until 4:40 after asking if I was forgot about! A heavier set girl in at the front desk said very dry “well they had to squeeze you in” as if I was a burden or something!   She left for the rest of the day. The other RECEPTIONIST I asked ignored me when I told her I’d been there for 40 min and never even got up to see what was going on Smh! The entire time I’m sitting in the waiting area the vision department was clapping and dancing to music (imagine how that feels to hear loud clapping after having your teeth pulled) VERY unprofessional! I finally was in the back at this point. The assistant that helped me was very nice and patient! I hate the fact that I didn’t get her name but I loved her attitude and how she was willingly trying to help me! I was sent home with antibiotics! The same antibiotics they said they didn’t give after a extraction smh and steroids for my swelling. He also gave me more tabs for pain as if I’m a junky or something or if that was going to make me happy. I’m not going back at all. Thanks but no thanks. On another note! They need to get better receptionist or this place will be going down hill! Never ever again

name: Hermosa Travels
text: Mobile Bay Dental is HORRIBLE all the staff needs to go to customer service 101everytime I come here for an appointment there is new staff no consistency at all you can't build a patient and staff relationship which is very important to some patient who comes and get dental work every 6 months. And the new dentist  they have now is TERRIBLE Dr. Rich that is he has no people skills and he preformed a horrible job on my fillings leaving me unable to floss and with a uneven bit for 4 days I had to make appointment with another dentist Dr. Rich was also flirting with his assistant making me feel very uncomfortable I wouldn't recommend Dr. Rich to work on a animal's mouth so please DO NOT take your family here

name: Sandra Anderson
text:
My Visit today was great and easy thank you Kristy for making is easy and painless and took care of me and my x-rays nurse was nice as will..
Thank you all.

name: Jinna Muhammad
text: Kristy did a awesome job with my cleaning. Very knowledgeable and great conversation. She definitely kept me entertained and made me comfortable. Never had an issues at this office. Thanks Kristy and Mobile Bay Dental!

name: Brittany Carter
text: Kristy and her team at Mobile Bay Dental & Vision has indeed educated me and worked full positive energy. Even though the covid moment they had made things feel safe and welcoming. They have respected my time, addressed my oral issues, and left me with my smile on my face so my personality can be my autograph!

name: Terika Murrell
text: My cleanings are always on point. The best Kristy always have my smile 😃 together..

name: Brea Lang

name: xzavius hill
text: Highly recommend me, my kids and a few family members go. They make sure all of our needs are met and I’m always pleased with their services. If there’s anything wrong they’ll assure to correct it.. This is surely a place I would recommend...

text: I’ve been going here for sometime. Kristie my DH is great! The staff are friendly and informative!

text: Dr.Gast is the most amazing dentist ever.I thank God I went to him.Another dentist left me in bad shape and Dr.Gast helped me so much.He is a great dentist and a great person.

name: Yolanda Hill
text: My experience here at Mobile Bay Dental and Vision was great.  My hygienist Kristy was great and thorough.

text: I highly recommend Mobile Bay Dental! From the beautiful office to friendly team, my experience was top notch! Kristy took the time to explain the cleaning process and was an absolute joy to converse with! Dr. Dabbs was very thorough and made sure to explain all options to help with my clenching problem. Overall a great experience!

name: Angela P.
text: This place is not the same since Dr Joshua  Dabbs left. I was not happy with the care received by one of the other doctors so I google searched for Dr Dabbs new location. Thankfully I found him at Advanced Dental Comfort, Fairhope, AL. I drive from Mobile to see him, very easy drive and now I'm back to receiving that exceptional and warm hearted care that I missed :)

name: Billy Bowyer
text: When we arrived they were having issues with their computer. However the professionalism with which the staff carried themselves, we never knew the computers were down until they told us. They were extremely prompt yet we never felt rushed. My daughter was nervous but due to the kind nature of all the staff she began to relax and actually enjoyed herself. The staff was kind, courteous and very informative. When you couple these attributes with the indoor playground, it's a Kidz Paradise wrapped in a dental office

name: Brittany Gamble
text: I love that I’m able to come right after work. Everyone here is so nice and hospitable. I had a great experience!  Christy was amazing and so patience! She was able to explain to me all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait for my next cleaning!! :)

name: Myeshia Smith
text: Dr Hankinson the owner and doctor at mobile bay dental in Semmes is very rude and so not kid friendly today was his second time being rude to my daughter once before he was rude to her at the bel air location my daughter was crying a little because she was scared to get teeth pulled and he told me he was not fixing to deal with that he didn’t even give my daughter a chance to calm down before he jumped up off his stool snatched his gloves off and walked out the room with no explanation he was extremely rude to us for the second time I will never take my daughter back to mobile bay ever again he has no patience for kids he told me once a bel air mall when my daughter cried he recommended the Semmes location because they were more kid friendly and now we go there this morning and his not kid friendly self was there I was extremely upset at how he treated us both times but today to find out he was the owner really took the cake for me

name: Monet Monet
text: The best dentist office I’ve ever been to!!! My 1 year old daughter felt so comfortable letting them assist her. No literally, you’ll fall IN LOVE with the staff! This is by far the most positive energy.. great atmosphere while waiting to be serviced.. very professional place of business with outstanding personality! They’re patient and they also make you so comfortable. I highly recommend this dentist office. Airport & Semmes location

name: Sara Pate
text: My children have been going to this dentist since they opened years ago... never had a problem, always very friendly, kind and helpful staff. Today on the other hand, I took all 3 of our kids in for their 6 mth checkup and cleaning. The hygienist was WONDERFUL.. the dentist/owner on the other hand was rude, arrogant, and crass. When he told me my oldest had a very deep cavity, I asked how it had gotten so deep in 6 mths, he chuckled and said oh we probably missed it the last time! Also when asking about dental issues that may arise with my daughter who has an autoimmune disease, I was met with incorrect, unsolicited medical advise infront of a room full of people that was very demeaning and humiliating! Needless to say I will be taking our business elsewhere.

name: Elizabeth Moses
text: Front desk was very welcoming! Dental hygienist were GREAT, especially Danielle!! we came in, they did their jobs and we got out at a good time. Highly recommend! Never a bad experience.

name: Liz Stringfellow
text: I’ve been waiting  for four months now for the vision Dr. to except the Medicaid they except Medicaid but not now. If you except Medicaid in the pass you should not stop because of a pandemic. Not right

resp.text: Our Belair Mall location is accepting all patients at this time. Please feel free to give us a call at 251-301-6555.

name: celeste Salazar
text: They called me back almost immediately and sat me in a room for TWO HOURS. After the first hour they numbed my mouth and then made me sit in there alone for another hour. Told the doctor I had been waiting for two hours and he dismissed me & they released me as a patient because I was annoyed of waiting two hours and waiting an hour with my mouth numb. Wasn’t gonna come back anyways 🤣✌🏼 Weak place frfr .

text: I always enjoy my visits here at Mobile Bay Dental! They are so very nice and sweet! Always make me feel like I am at home! I love the way Patrica cleans my teeth!

name: Enocolis Lampkin
text: They are so nice, sweet and professional at the semmes location. kristy and Dr. Gasty  and staff was wonderful.

name: Vickie Collier
text: I have been taking my 2 girls to the one downtown and I give everyone there 5 ⭐'s. Now I take my grandkids to the one in Semmes. I'm so thankful that Dr. Hankinson expanded to other parts of Mobile County.

name: Denisse Lamastra
text: Both my kids are both dental patients here and the staff is always friendly and helpful. On my last visit, Gabby in Vision went the extra mile to help me as I was picking up a frame for my sons new glasses. She heard what I was looking for and helped me find it. She was patient and helpful. I appreciated that she was not in a rush just to get it done, but was attentive and giving me great customer service. I would 100% recommend this place for anyone with children.

name: Margaret Texmed
text: I Always leave here feeling great about my teeth. Danelle was amazing and so knowledgeable about her craft. Love that they all do their best to save my teeth. See you soon Mobile Bay Dental.

name: Kimberly Phillips
text: Love the staff of the dental and vision. It's very family friendly and the staff are very accommodating. It even has a little door for little kids to come in and feel independent.

name: Lori Oliver
text: This place is great! When I first walked in it was a little hectic, they have a play area for kids which is amazing, but the also have a adult only waiting room which was very nice. The staff here is top notch. Everyone from the girl at the desk that checked me in to the dentist was friendly and knowledgeable. I have a little anxiety when seeing any doctor and the dentist was kind and understanding of that. I had a tooth pulled, painless and unbelievably quick. I would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Mobile Bay dentist!

name: Heather Davis
text: The staff at mobile bay dental did a wonderful job for me and my children today. Danielle was the best, and I couldn’t have accomplished 3 cleanings at once without them.

name: christine bryan
text: Ashley did a Great job! Very thorough with cleaning, very informative and patient with my questions. Dr.Geiss was very nice. Look forward to next visit.

name: Jennifer delaune
text: Love this office! Dr. Perry is amazing! She explained things to me that I have never experienced before with any other optometrist. She really cares about her patients. All the staff was very sweet as well. We will definitely be back!!

name: Robin Andrews
text: I have been using Mobile Bay Dental for years. They are really great!! I always feel like they really care about my teeth & they have always been very friendly & the building is beautiful as well!!

name: Lamar Griffin
text:
most unprofessional business I've ever dealt with.
won't let me give zero stars.

do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

name: Jamarcus White
text: Had a Good Day Today. They Was Quick And Fast. Kristy was my hygienist and Educated Me On Things I Didn’t Know. Had a great Overall Experience

name: Liz Nguyen
text: Patricia was amazing. I learned a lot while she cleaned my teeth. It was painless also. I’ve never had such a great experience! I usually hate getting my teeth cleaned but she made it easy!

name: Vanessa
text: This place is amazing if you have kids. The staff is patient and caring, plus they have an indoor kids theater and playground.  Madison and Kelly made my daughter feel extra special and they took care of us quickly. They accept All Kids and have a nice waiting room. The kids dental area has seating for parents and vibrant saltwater fish decor.

name: Gail Shields
text: Dr. Gast and his assistant are AMAZING! I have had several dental issues, and he ALWAYS takes his time and does a remarkable job. He is extremely professional, and cares about his patients. His assistant does also. I wish I could give them both more stars, but he will forever be my dentist. His office staff is ALWAYS friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Gast and his staff.

name: Victoria Meeks
text: I love Dr Perry, and staff !!

name: bex bama
text:
I went to this dentist a few months ago to have a crown glued back in. It only took approximately 2 minutes, total. However, I was in the office well over 3 hours. When I left, the lobby lights were off, no staff was available to check me out. The crown hasn’t come out since but a patient’s time should be considered. The fact that crown is still holding is the only reason they get 1 star.
Now, I brought my mother in today for an extraction. Although she was called back just 7 minutes past her appointment time, I fear I will be waiting for them to finish the job till the lobby is closed yet again.
I, personally, will not continue seeing the dentists at Mobile Bay Dental because I do value my time. Apparently, the staff at this particular dentist does not.

name: James Bosarge
text: it was a great experience!

name: Cassandra Dumas
text: The dentist was super nice and kept coming back to check on my daughter just to see her reaction of her new caps which she loves. Just putting in the extra effort was amazing. Kelly was super sweet and she gets five stars from us any day. Thanks so much for a wonderful experience. We love you Kelly!!!!!

name: ADAM N
text: Mobile Bay Dental is the best dentist's office I've ever been to. Super clean. Friendly staff. Great service.

name: Shagy Seven
text:
Great care, made sure I was comfortable. Was one of the best visits I've had to the dentist! The price was also more fair than others I shopped around with. Was fortunate enough they could squeeze me in on a Friday on short notice.
I will definitely be back for the rest of the work I need! Thanks to the staff I had working on me!

name: Manuella Coleman
text: I went to the location in the mall and everyone is nice friendly and helpful. The dentist is very kind and considerate of how much pain you are in and tries to be gentle. I am definitely going to come back.

name: Sharon Shula
text: A wonderful day at the dentist. Kristy was helpful and friendly.

name: Melia Nicholson-Franklin
text: I love the staff and the facility. My kids do also!! Very adult and kid friendly!! Thanks for all the help Danielle!!!

name: Jamie Newsome
text: This dentist office deserves more then 5 stars. Awesome staff, very clean and all around great place! If you need a dentist go see them!

name: kristen holcombe
text: I had a good visit as usual! Kristy made me feel comfortable and she was very knowledgeable!😊

name: Krystal Littrell
text: My kids and I love coming to this location!!! It's kid friendly on one side and then the adult side is calming and relaxing. The staff is amazing and friendly. I've had a ton of work done on my mouth after I had an accident in December and they've made everything simple and easy and explain all my procedures in terms that I can understand. Truly recommend this location for the entire family.

name: Christina Daughtry
text: My eight year old had a horrific experience a couple of years ago when having dental work done. The young lady, Jessica, who helped him was very friendly and understanding. After administering nitrous oxide, my son calmed down and the procedure was completed very quickly and painlessly. I am extremely grateful for the patience, understanding and level of professionalism I experienced during our visit and would recommend this dental practice to all of my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Well, I will never go back there, because they charge you taxes on your total  bill instead of charging you taxes on what you pay!!!! I ended up paying $100 extra then I would have if I went somewhere else!!! They need to  inform you more and explain it better!!! Because I would have took my prescriptions somewhere else. I have been getting glasses for 5 years and I have ever paid taxes on the total!!! I always paid on what my portion was!!! Please read all the reviews before choosing this vision care!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback and for the opportunity to allow us to explain the way that we charge our patients for Sales Tax on ophthalmic materials. Our policies are strictly adherent to the guidelines set forth by the Alabama Department of Revenue. We can only control the activities of our offices, and cannot comment on what policies may be in place at other practices you previously visited. At Mobile Bay Vision, we are committed to providing you with excellent care, and we understand how frustrating paying taxes can be. Unfortunately, we do not have any influence on what state law dictates. We can only follow the laws set forth by our lawmakers.

name: Jessica Folse
text: I love the entire building!! The front desk girls are the best! I came in with 3 of my kids and one of them was my 2 year old son, first time at the dentist, who was nearing the end of potty training and after they finished with him, making his first experience an easy one, and while I was in the back myself, they watched him play on the playground. WELL, he had an accident and peed all the way down the slide and they did not even hesitate! They shut the playground down climbed in that slide and cleaned up the entire thing while I was still in the back! They never once made me feel like it was my fault and they actually blamed it on themselves for giving him water. They are always so sweet and accommodating for me with my 5 kids. As long as this place is open I'll never go anywhere else! And Callie Taylor, Dr. Q and Dr. Gast are the best!

name: Bianca White
text: I don't even know where to start. I feel like the staff was very unprofessional. People were constantly in and out of the room, asking questions, getting supplies having personal conversations over my mouth. Which would have been better had they not been having problems fitting the crown but I felt as though they should have been more focused on that than on greys anatomy. We were there for 3 hours for a fill in and a crown. When it was time to check out there was only one person at the desk and a line of people waiting. When asked if there was assistance available the front desk clerk just told us to call back and schedule an appointment if necessary. Which isn't what we needed but we ended up leaving anyway. Definitely won't be going back.

name: Aaliyah Taylor
text: The staff in the vision center here is amazing! Ms. Leah and Brandy were so helpful and kind. I will definitely be back!

name: Water Staff
text: Great staff! The hygienist, Danielle did an excellent job and was very helpful with questions that I had.

name: Brantley Cook
text:
Wonderful dentistry. Assistants were very helpful and provided a pleasant experience. Calm atmosphere. Great service. I can't wait to come back, actually. 9.5/10

P.S.-Ask for Alicia and Gina! They tended to me and were absolutely wonderful!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dr. Terry and her assistant were great, as was the woman in the glasses area. They were very patient and explained things very thoroughly and were very understanding with a little bit of fear on the part of my family member. A woman in the glasses area brought out about a dozen other choices that they did not have room to display. I was put on hold for 13 minutes, however when I called to confirm our appt., at which point they almost hung up on me before I could actually get all of the information. And then it turned out that they also did not confirm the location, and so when we arrived at the place that I made the appointment for, they told me that the appointment was for the other location. Fortunately, they were not busy and were able to go ahead with the exam at location where we were. All of that could have been resolved though, with simply slowing down during the phone call, and being more thorough. Or use text to confirm! Great once you get there.

name: Laura Coletta
text: The doctors and hygienists are pretty awesome but the girls at the front desk, not that much.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Great service and Kristy was my hygienist and she is awesome!  Would highly recommend this place!

name: Minh Tran
text: The purpose of my visit was for an extraction. Everyone was very polite and friendly and before I knew it everything was finished. Would highly recommend this location and the wonderful staff.

name: Caylei Hicks
text: This has been my girls dentist since 2012 and we will never go anywhere else! They are always so kind, professional, fast, and friendly! They always make my girls feel at home and comfortable with any procedure being done!!

name: shane533
text:
Everyone was great and made going to the dentist fun.

Christie was the best.

name: Mason Andrew
text: I had a really good experience. The doctor took her time with my exam and Danielle helped me with my glasses. I would recommend everyone to see Dr Perry.

name: Shemeka Harper
text: I gave 1 stars because it's been a pleasure working with them . The problem is with payments in between the 2 offices and time wasted since they cant get their financial team together . text: The staff are always pretty friendly and the office is amazing. Unfortunately the dentist doesn't seem like he should be working with children. The first visit (for a pulled tooth) the dentist eventually stopped and gave him another shot, after which he was fine. This 2nd time, we were told we were the ONLY patients in the office, but the dentist seemed inconvenienced to even come in the room,  didn't say 2 words to me and acted in a rush to leave. He started a filling and my son raised his hand and made noises to let him know he could feel it, but the dr kept going and told the nurses "He's fine." Then when my son finally jumped & grabbed his hand, he got aggravated and said to refer us to a pediatric dentist to be sedated. Very rudely made a point to say he wasn't even touching his teeth when he jumped. He didn't even offer to give him another shot or try to comfort him/talk to him about what he was feeling. My son is 11, knows what he can feel & has never had this problem with other dentists. :( I am very disappointed that an office so heavily geared towards children & close to home, has such an impatient & unkind dentist.

name: Rex Perkins
text:
I was a patient of Dr. Burdette's for over 10 years. A great doctor she is. However, she no longer owns TFM and it seems like the greedy corporation take over has ruin what was once a great doctor's office.

I showed to an appointment recently that was badly needed, as I had some concerns about me health including new issues. I had no prior contact with the office in any way before my appointment or was told nothing at previous visits. But money is what they wanted. I had no idea I had a bill, but the first thing they told me was "you can't be seen today" and then go on to tell me about the bill, which I offered to pay on, but I didn't have my cc with me at the time and offered to pay when I came back in a few days to get blood work results.

They gave their spiel about how doctors need to get paid too, and would I work without expecting to get paid, and blah blah blah. I' believe people deserve to get paid for good services. After all, I had been coming there for over 10 years and paid ever single bill prior, so why would anyone think I wouldn't pay this one. I've my own business before, I know it's important to get paid.  But shouldn't human decency and kindness be the first form of communication one starts with instead of the "I want my money first" attitude?

For me, I felt abandon by a doctor's office that I had been coming to for years. That I trusted my children with. I was given zero notice before being told I couldn't be seen. I was over due for certain treatments that I have to see the doctor or nurse to receive. I had concerns about my blood pressure and other issues that were important to prevent increased medical problems. I didn't want to hear their spew about "working for free" or we have to be paid to continue services, I wanted to hear. "Ok, what can we do to help you out? We're here for you." Treat people like this first I guarantee you will always get paid.

Or at the least I wanted the bare treatment until I had enough time to find another doctor for treatment, but I wasn't even given that. Yes, they offered to see me again, but made it clear I was going to have to jump through some hoops and pay, always with an emphasis on getting paid, never about what I thought doctors first priority was supposed to be: to do no harm an give their patients the best medical care they can ( not for free of course), but a good doctor put's people first. Dr. Burdette always did this, but this new corporation or whomever owns Taylorville Family Medicine now, IS ALL ABOUT THE MONEY AND COULDN'T CARE LESS ABOUT YOU. It's sad, and I foresee more year long patients leaving in time, as well. It's not the same anymore.

resp.text: Hey Rex thank you for taking the time to write us a review! Our payment policies have changed, but they are still ethical to our patients. Our patients are still atop our value hierarchy and always will be. Thanks again!

text: Don’t waste your time. What a joke. Got there to my doctors appointment at 9:45 and my appointment wasn’t til 10. I didn’t get to be seen til 11:25! I had to go the the receptionist to see if Dr. Burdette was behind. Long story short. She only sees two patients and with 15 minute delays. 😑. Seriously! Only because they only have a few rooms. Not my problem! Maybe they need to get a better place with more rooms instead of 4 or even put a sign up saying “you will wait at least an hour or more for your visit”. I wished I knew that before I even became a new patient or I wouldn’t even waste my time....finding a new doctor. 👋🏻

resp.text: The information you are sharing is incorrect, but due to HIPAA we will not be able to comment further.  We appreciate you giving our practice an opportunity to provide you medical care.  We also realize that not every patient and practice is a match, this being one of those cases.  We wish you the best of luck finding a primary care physician who can meet all of your expectations with NO wait time.  Good Luck.

name: C Davis
text: My family and I have had several bad experiences here. Some of the examples are being misdiagnosed, not being told about potential issues in the blood work that was done, and waiting for extended periods of time to see the a nurse practitioner when the waiting area was nearly empty. To top all of that, they have even sent us bills on different occasions for things that had already been paid! I would give this office a 0 star rating if possible. If for some reason you choose to use them, keep your receipts!

name: Marcy Weinberger
text: Dr. Burdette is an excellent physician, in my opinion. She is careful, comprehensive and purposeful in her assessment and treatment of me without wasting my time or healthcare dollars on unnecessary tests and procedures. She and her staff also are very kind and listen carefully to my concerns. Finally, she provides referrals to talented specialists when appropriate. I have been a patient of hers for about two decades and I hope she never retires! BTW, I have never had to wait an excessive amount of time in the waiting room.

name: Tammy Plowman
text: The staff is always friendly and helpful . They work with you to see a doctor even when you don’t have an appointment . Shout outs to Tonyia Jones and Kimberly Carver

name: Kayle Vaught
text: Mikayla or whatever her name is, is so rude. Do not waste your time here. I will be reporting to HR and corporate about how unprofessional she is.

resp.text: We apologize for such a response. We have been attempting to reach you but it seems that you are NOT a patient with our practice.  If you could please contact our office about this review since we are getting conflicting information.

name: Cristal Robertson
text: I've used Dr. Burdette for years and have been treated great by all staff members

name: Rebecca Cowan
text: I have used Dr. Burdette for years and I have always been completely satisfied with my visits. However, she now takes same day sick walk-in visits and I am over the moon excited!! Last week, I was walking around the UA campus.....looking for some fun, of course.....and I tripped over a curb and landed on all fours. You can imagine my embarrassment....bent over on all fours looking up at a sweet, blue-eyed gentleman, asking if I was ok. Well, I wasn't ok, but this lady was not going to let him see my pain as he hoisted me up off my knees, then had to unbend my back as it popped and groaned at him. As soon as I could get back to my car, I drove straight to see Dr. Burdette. Well, as I walked in the door, the sweet receptionist, Elizabeth, quickly helped me and didn't even laugh at my humiliating story. I was in and out from seeing Dr. Burdette in no time at all. Thank you, Elizabeth and Dr. Burdette!!

name: Donna Tittle
text: I was a mess medically when I moved here over 8 years ago and since then with Doctor Burdette and her staff, I now can move, breathe and have a chance of a longer happier life.Thanks for all your hard work. If you need the best. Here's your answer.

name: clara hostetter
text: The staff is VERY rude, won’t call you back!!! Don’t waste your time, not a place to trust your health care.

resp.text: Hi "clara",  we would have loved the opportunity to have discussed this issue before such a negative public rating.  We will be more than happy to forward your medical records to the physician of your choice, if you will call our office and identify yourself.

name: Hunter Standridge
text: Rude staff

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback Hunter! That is definitely an area we are continuously improving

name: S C
text: I have used Dr. Burdette for several years after my primary physician passed away. Today I had an appointment scheduled with her that I had been waiting months for, my appointment was at 3:15pm at 3:00pm I received a text that said they were running behind and my new appointment time would be at 3:31pm and that they would text me again before my appointment to confirm. At 3:30pm I received the same text. I went ahead to the appointment because I needed to be seen and I would just wait in my car. When I went in and checked with the receptionist she told me that I was 45 minutes late and that they would have to reschedule my appointment. I showed her the texts and she said that they only sent the one text that was generated when I did not show up for my appointment at 3:15pm. THIS IS COMPLETELY UNTRUE!!!!  I was very upset, she told me that it would throw them completely behind to try and see me and that she talked to the owner and he said that I would have to reschedule. There was absolutely no one in the waiting room. While telling me this a woman walked in and said are you still open? She said yes and checked her in for bloodwork. But they can’t admit their mistakes when it comes to texts that cause problems and let me be seen. They then sent one of the medical assistants out to talk to me. He was VERY RUDE AND CONDESCENDING, after telling me that I should have come and checked in at my appointment time he went on to tell me that he was always at least 15 minutes early for ever appointment he has ever scheduled. When I told him that was foolish for me to come and sit in a reception area for an undetermined amount of time in the middle of a pandemic-he told me I could have waited in my car. When I told him that I was working and felt that was ridiculous he told me that he was a single parent to 2 children whose mother had died and that he had to be both parents to his children and still keep his appointments and go to work everyday to support them. This all in a raised voice that apparently carried. When he finally stopped his tirade, or I could have possibly interrupted him to tell him that my husband passed away in 2012 and that I also have 2 children that I have had to raise myself while working and keeping appointments and yes I raised my voice too. At that point, the nursing staff came out and told me to leave and that the owner would call me. That I was upsetting the patients in the office. Really??? I have always been at my appointments, I have watched this office deteriorate over the last couple of years, I like Dr Burdette but it is clear from all the things that have happened and from the way they have treated me (and others if you read the google reviews and not all the five star reviews they have on there site which I am positive they solicit and approve) that Dr Burdette has absolutely no control over what happens with her patients. I am certain that the owner will never call me and if he does it will probably be to tell me not to come back. Which he doesn’t need to do because I will not be treated like that and will find another doctor. One that actually cares about the needs of their patients and does not treat them like they treated me today. I am extremely disappointed in Dr Burdette, I feel like after 10 years she should have at the very least - have talked to me herself, but she did not, I feel very sad that she cared so little for me as her patient but I guess I just misjudged her as well. This is not the first problem I have had with them but it will be the last. The NP’s there miss a lot of things and you almost never see Dr Burdette unless you specifically ask to and then things like this happen. I expect them to not release my records without a fight also. Please think before you make an appointment here and please don’t put yourself in risk if you feel that you are not getting the care you need and deserve at this or any of their clinics. I will be reporting all of what happened to me today to my insurance company and to the state medical board. No one should be treated this way - ever!!

resp.text: Thank you for visiting and leaving a review detailing your experience SC! We are continuously improving all of our protocols and procedures regarding issues like these to make them obsolete. This occurrence seems to be an anomaly and we will be stay cognizant of such situations. Again, thanks for your review and our apologies for what has transpired.

name: Marcie Wood
text: Dr Burdette is Wonderful

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: Love them all very nice!

name: Robert Rakowski
text:
(Translated by Google) Good tests, I recommend: D

name: Peggy Walden
text: Dr. Courtney Lowe, MD, Debbie Lowe his Nurse/PA/wife along with the staff are nice, friendly & welcoming. They show concern & care for all patients & always treat with the best medical care possible. They treat you respectfully as if you were their own family. They are a joy to be around & I've never dreaded going to an appointment. Thank you Etowah Family Medical. May God continue to bless you all. 💞

name: Anthony King
text:
Upon arrival I was met at the door and they took my temperature and asked me a series of questions pertaining to the Covid virus before I was allowed to enter the building. My visit went well and the doctor went over everything and explained in detail everything about my condition and the meds that he wanted me to take. He wasn’t in a hurry and made sure I understood what he was talking about. The whole staff was courteous and professional.
Thanks

name: Marie Fells
text: I have been a patient of Dr Lowe's for many years. I have never had a problem he couldn't find. I recognize Dr. Lowe to everyone. I Love All of the employees here.

name: Trebor Llorrac
text: Dr. Lowe is the worst doctor I've ever visited. He seems to think all my health problems come from smoking. I smoke about a pack of day by the way. I have restless leg syndrome, a jaw condition called TMJ, diabetes and a good bit of joint pain. it doesn't matter what health condition I want to talk about, he blames all my health problems on smoking. My dad was diabetic and smoked 3 to 4 packs a day. He did not have all these aches and pains that I have. My boss is in his sixties, smokes cigarettes and is diabetic. He does not complain of aches and pains at all. I understand smoking may irritate a pre-existing condition. But the key word here is pre-existing condition. There must be something else going on. I was hit by a car and knocked down when I was little. I have had problems with my hip since. Dr Lowe refuses to look at it because I haven't quit smoking cigarettes yet. All of my aches and pains come from smoking cigarettes and I'm diabetic. I  complained about a lot of pain in my right leg on my last visit. He refused to look at it because I still smoke. So I went to doctors care across from walmart  who found that I had a torn muscle and soft tissue damage. But he actually looked at it. I will be replacing doctor lowe as soon as other doctors are allowing new patients. I wish doctors care accepted my insurance. I am sick and tired of getting blown off because he is against smoking. If somebody comes in and complains about something ,it should be looked at. He acts like I have the plague because I smoke. My husband is dying to have a word with him. But I do my best to keep my husband away because my husband will bite his freaking head off. He is very protective of me. I wonder if I can find a veterinarian to take care of me. I'm sure they would do a better job than doctor lowe does. And they probably wouldn't talk to me like a dog as as badly dr. Lowe does. Worst doctor i have visited so far in my life.

name: Shannon Arledge
text: Love Dr. Lowe! He is a great Dr. And takes the time to listen to your needs. Great staff there also!

name: gary shirkey
text: Wish to tell dr.lowe when referred to dr.tamala,he noticed I had a hiatal hernia, along with having to expand my esophagus ! March 3rd is surgery !

name: Kathy Hill
text: Doctor Lowe&miss  Debbie great team makes going to Doctor easer best ever

name: Marie Fells
text: The Staff, and especially, Dr. Lowe and Debbie Lowe is Awesome. They have become family to me. Best Dr. And Staff in Gadsden. Dr. Lowe takes the time to listen to you about your health problems. He has Always helped me with the big or little health problems.

name: Robbi & Lisa Stone
text: Everyone seemed very friendly and professional. Also took good care and time with concerning my medical problems. Thank you, Robbi Stone

name: Lynn Marshall
text: Love Dr Lowe. He's the best!

name: James Bryant
text:
Your staff and You have cared for my health, and my wife, for years now
at my age I probably would not be on the scene without your knowledge
and abilities to care for us humans, thanks !!!  JRB

name: Valarie Fancher
text: Dr. Lowe is the best 😁

name: Misty Brown
text: Great doctor!!!

name: Mercedes Lyle
text:
I’ve been a patient of Dr. Lowe & Miss Deb for quite a few years & he has always given me the very best medical care. When needed he has sent me to specialist doctors to get the best treatment available.
He’s a serious doctor about your health but he has a way to always make you smile. He has a wonderful staff too!!! I love them all.

name: marie hill
text: Always prompt and excellent medical care. This practice runs like a machine, but with caring, kind , very smart medical people who make it perfect.I’m so glad to be a patient here!

name: Virginia
text: I feel like the staff and nurses are really listening. They are thorough, caring and respectful. I definitely recommend this practice!

name: Jaenelle G
text: “New Patient Openings Available with Referral”.  Instead of having a sign up list, allowing equal access to care for all, they have opted to have a referral process. Not only must you get a referral from a current patient, but must have one of the two insurances specified on the website. I personally feel as though this is a discriminatory process. It is sad to see that this is the future of healthcare.

resp.text: Jaenelle, thank you for your feedback, we recently removed our universal signup list. Last month when we took the sign-up down we had received 600 applications over the prior 3 months. We believed it was misleading to have a signup list on our website when we did not anticipate being able to add that many patients anytime in the next year and there are many other clinics in town accepting new patients. Meanwhile, our existing patients periodically get married or have children and ask for their new family member(s) to be a part of the practice, we allow them to be referred in through the process you read about. Regarding insurances, there are many insurances that we are not credentialed with or "in-network" for and we cannot accept those insurances. We have specified two insurances that we are confident we will continue to be able to accept, Medicare, which is available to all American's over age 65 and Blue Cross of Alabama, the largest insurer in our state. Please let us know if you have suggestions on how we can communicate this situation better.

name: Amelia Hooper
text: Kelley Rogers (CRNP) and Dr. Uptagrafft are wonderful. They take the time to address every concern of mine, and they listen to everything I have to say. They're the best primary care I've ever experienced. The Innova staff are all friendly and helpful, and the online portal system is super convenient! 11/10

name: Stephanie Monteleone
text: Innova has a very kind and caring staff. I have (thankfully) never needed a sick visit but am very happy with the care I have received during annual well visits. My primary care giver listens, follows up on past concerns, and offers helpful advice. The recent changes in service fees were communicated well with multiple forms of communication, including a newsletter and one-on-one phone calls, which was greatly appreciated. Innova embraces technology and communicates changes well.

name: Brenda Eddy
text:
Innova Ptimary Care is  EXCELLENT and I highly recommend it!  The physician that I see is Dr. Diaz.  She is caring and genuine.  She listens, provides feedback and never rushes me in out of the office.  The staff is pleasant and efficient;  Innova's office and facilities are clean.  If needed, same day appointments are available.   In fact, they have several physician assistants that handle ONLY same day patients and their health issues.
This office runs smoothly and I've never had any problems.   "Try it.  You'll like it!"

name: Kyla Sullivan
text: Everyone is so kind and professional. The best PCP experience I’ve had in north AL!

name: Bonnie Jarvis
text: Everyone is very friendly and polite.I am properly informed of my health and care.I never have to wait more than a few minutes for a scheduled apt. I’m very happy with this practice.

name: Peg & Nate C
text: So thankful for Innova Primary Care team!! All the Doctors, and team work seamlessly together!!    They deserve 10 plus stars!!  Thank you 😊

name: Michael Maleski
text: From welcome staff to nurses to doctors, this Innova Primary Care location cares about their patients total well being and it shows through the time they spend with you to answer all of your questions.

name: Heather Hall
text: Absolutely one of the best experiences I have ever had in a doctors office.  From the moment I walked in to the reception area to the time I walked out the front doors, every person I came in contact with was kind.  I have seen two doctors and one of the nurse practitioners.  They listen to you and don’t seem rushed.  Love this office.

resp.text: Heather, your kind words are so encouraging to our team, thank you! We appreciate your trust in partnering with our team for your health and thank you for sharing your 5-star review with others.

name: Rita Walker
text: Easy check in on your phone for visit. Very nice & courteous staff.

name: Chelsea McCool
text: Searched Huntsville over for years for a good primary doctor. I could not have asked for a more genuine caring practice than Innova. They really do serve their patients at an above and beyond standard. Very knowledgeable, very caring- no matter who you see-!

resp.text: We strive to serve with consistency and excellence and are thankful for your kind words and partnership with Innova for your health. Thank you, Chelsea, for taking the time to leave your review and for choosing our team to care for you.

name: Danielle
text: Innova does a great job at being thorough and timely. They some how manage to pay attention and listen to whatever your concerns are while still respecting your time. They also have a great system where you can do everything you need through their app. The only downside is there are quite a few fees associated with tasks such as refills outside of an appt. etc. I decided it was worth it to have an attentive staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your 5 star review Danielle and for your encouraging words for our team here at Innova! As you mentioned, we do charge fees for services not covered by insurance, we are glad you believe it is worth it for the service we provide. As part of our core value to increase transparency and trusted relationships in healthcare, these non-covered fees are listed on our website. While the charges are small for one patient, the thousands of requests we receive outside of appointments every month do add up. For example, we have received and responded to over 2,400 portal messages from patients in the last month and over 20,000 so far year to date, and that doesn't even include phone calls. The fees we charge allow us to hire the additional skilled professionals on our team that are necessary to provide the level of responsiveness and service we strive to provide and that our patients have come to expect. We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and for partnering with our team for your health.

name: Matthew Dennis
text: Great doctors and staff. Great care and they actually listen to you

name: Lindsay Grissom
text: I just started at Innova Primary Care and I love it so far. The process is seamless and they are very on top of all the paperwork and forms needed before your first visit. Everyone I have spoke with has been very friendly and professional. The monthly fee mentioned in some comments below is just a few dollars a month for unlimited services that most practices would bill you per service for. It is a great deal. My first appointment was with Kelly. She spent a lot of time with me for an initial visit and asked all the right questions. The tele-visit options are very convenient. I highly recommend Innova Primary Care!

resp.text: Thank you Lindsay for your kind words and for taking the time to leave your review for our team at Innova! We are here to care for you, thank you for partnering with us for your health.

name: Carol O
text: The Innova Primary Care facility is clean, the check in portal is user friendly, and I have never had a long wait when I have an appointment. The entire staff is caring, friendly, and professional. There are proactive safety precautions in place to keep everyone safe during this COVID-19 Pandemic. Dr. Kelly Diaz is the best! She shows genuine interest in my health. She is kind, patient, explains things, and answers all of my questions. I never feel rushed during my appointments. I highly recommend Innova Primary Care.

resp.text: Thank you for your encouraging words Carol, our team very much appreciates your support and taking the time to leave your review! Thank you for partnering with us for your care.

name: Bryan Baker
text: Great practice that is very well run. The check-in process is easy, the lobby and rooms clean, and all of the practitioners are awesome!  Not only are they knowledgeable but they are also super nice. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Bryan! We strive for efficiency and respecting the value of our patients time when they are here at Innova. Thank you for taking the time to leave your supportive words and for partnering with our team here at Innova for your health.

name: Danae Riley
text: Always very caring! The whole staff is always there to answer my questions and take care of me. I use the patient portal and it doesn't take long for them to answer me. I recommend them completely!!

resp.text: Hi Danae, we appreciate you and are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!  Thank you for embracing our patient portal, we strive to respond promptly and it is so much more efficient than phone-tag that often happens with physician offices. If you haven't already downloaded it, please check out the healow app for your phone so that you have even more convenient access to telehealth and communication with us. Thank you for your encouraging words and for your 5-star feedback.

name: Holly Morris
text: Exceptional practice full of caring and thorough staff. They are doing excellent to manage COVID concerns with sanitation and cleanliness protocols. I always feel safe going. I never feel rushed to share my health concerns. They are hyper organized which is much appreciated for a working mom with not hours left to be spent at the doctor. On a particular taxing and scary medical day, they showed me great compassion and kindness. Bedside manner is the best I’ve seen in doctors and nurses in all of Huntsville!

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words and for allowing our team to care for you as a guest here at Innova! Like you, all of our Providers here are working Moms, and we strive to be organized and efficient out of respect for our patients' time. We appreciate your partnership for health and your encouragement, thank you.

name: Whitney Lee
text: Dr. Kelly Diaz is a very kind, thorough and knowledgeable physician. She is my PCP and I would highly recommend her. I have not met the other providers yet but I have heard good things about them from other patients in the community. Innova primary care staff was also very accommodating and helpful. Can not recommend enough.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your encouraging review Whitney and for partnering with our team for your health!

resp.text: Rebecca, you made our day! Your kind words have been shared with our whole team at Innova, thanks for taking the time to leave your review and for partnering with our team at Innova for the health of you and your family.

text: Love Innova from the physicians to the facility.  Never had a doctor who appreciates your time.  They are always on time, attentive, and courteous!  Love the patient portal and various things they offer!

resp.text: Mel, you made our day! We are here to serve you and greatly appreciate your kind words, these will be shared with the entire team. Thank you for partnering with Innova for your health and for taking the time to leave your encouraging review!

text: I'm a new patient, but so far Innova has been terrific. The NP talked with me for nearly an hour, and she was kind enough to ignore my fussy baby throughout the visit. Also, the telehealth option is so convenient.

resp.text: Hi Jonathon, we appreciate you and are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!  We love fussy babies and are quite used to them in our own homes, thank you for taking the time to leave your comments and for your 5-star feedback.

name: Bret Coulter
text: First visit today with Dr. Diaz and she and everyone in the office are top notch. Looking forward to my next visit!!!

name: Ed Culpepper
text: Innova Primary Care offers competent, compassionate, congenial primary medical care for patients in a wide spectrum of life stages. The practice incorporates the best of new technologies and processes, including efficient use of patient portal and Tele-med appointments. Everyone on the medical team provides medical care that fosters confidence and security that the patient's health needs are well cared for.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Emily, we are thankful to be able to care for you, Happy New Year!

text: I am new to this practice but, I am very pleased so far. I appreciate being accepted as a patient.

resp.text: Hi Tamara, thank you for your review and for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are glad you have partnered with our team at Innova for your health!

name: Lauren Schifano
text: The experience from signing up to be a new patient to walking out the door of my first appointment was easily the best I have had. resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your thorough review, we strive to provide a positive and connected experience for our guests and appreciate your enthusiastic use of the technology we use to make that possible!

name: Broussard Floyd
text:
This is my ninth year as a patient at Innova. I was seen as recently as yesterday, at my request, on very short notice. All of the Innova ancillary staff I have dealt with, have been competent, courteous and easy to deal with.
At various times, I have been seen by Dr. Uptagrafft, Amy and Allison. I am very appreciative for the professional, compassionate and superb care all three provide me.
