name: Ariana Palma
text: So I’ve been going here for over a year now, I was seeing Kathryn Limbaugh, but sadly, she left. HOWEVER, there’s a new doctor (Dr. Fennell), and she was amazing! She addressed ALL of my concerns and took the time to sit down and explain things to me. Very kind and patient, definitely recommend this clinic!!!!(:

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Palma. We sincerely appreciate the kind words and the 5-star review! We're so pleased to hear that you had a great first impression of Dr. Fennell. Thank you for your patience and understanding during our transition to a new provider.

name: carrie ivy
text: Friendly, professional staff. I have been seeing a physician here since September 2020 and have never had an issue. I have never had to wait longer than expected and have always had an efficient and helpful experience when calling the office.

resp.text: That's great to hear, Carrie! Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your experience with us. We are glad to have you as part of the Huntsville Hospital Physician Care-Bailey Cove family and look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Kimberly Hopkins
text: Good Dr and nurses. Pleasant.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Hopkins. Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We appreciate the trust you have placed in us and will do our best to continue providing you with 5-star care and service.

name: Big Kahuna
text: I do not know what background issues are going on here but I certainly feel that my current level of care here is inadequate.  My primary physician left the practice and the profession (to my knowledge) - unfortunate since she was an excellent dr.  I recently went for a physical and felt it was cursory at best, at least I got the blood panels/analysis done.  Had some prescription refills at the time,  later found out that insurance needed further justification.  My pharmacy contacted the drs. office and I've contacted them twice now.  I've yet to have my calls/questions returned and apparently they've never contacted my insurance.  Called again today (Thursday) at 2:45 and got a message saying they were closed, no explanation why.  I'm moving out of the area soon or I would definitely find a new dr. and office

resp.text: Hello. We are very sorry to hear about this and would welcome the opportunity to speak with you about your concerns. Please call (256) 428-4900 at your convenience and ask for the Practice Administrator.

name: Matt M
text: Don’t care about their patients/clients.

resp.text: Hello, Matt. We would love to speak with you so we can personally address your concerns. Please call (256) 428-4900 and ask for the Practice Administrator.

name: Ansliegh Hall
text:
They take forever to answer the phones. The people in the office were really nice but when you call you can expect to be on hold for 30+ minutes. I had to sit in the health department for 30-45 minutes on hold just to ask for a fax number. It's really ridiculous and unprofessional that they can't answer the phones in a timely manner.

Update: I continue to be unimpressed with this office since we've moved to TN. I filled out a release form to get my sons records from this office (that's why I was calling for the fax number before) and they took almost an entire month to send the records, then to top it off they didn't even send all of his records. They only sent records up to July even though he had shots in September as well, so the lady at the Health Department had to call them herself and tell them to send the rest of the records. I just can't believe how unprofessional this office is, I had literally no issues with them when I was taking my son there but now that we've moved away they have made it so hard for me to get my son the healthcare he needs.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Hall. We are sorry to have kept you waiting. We will let the Practice Administrator know you are frustrated with being placed on hold. For future reference, our fax number is (256) 428-4912.

name: Limanman Strange
text:
This office many times will not answer their phones. This has happened more than once. Today (a non-holiday Thursday) I called at 1:38pm only to get their answering machine which said office hours were till 5pm with lunch from 12:00 till 1pm. Well it was 1:38pm!
I stayed on the line and was connected to their answering service. When asked if the office was closed, the lady with the answering service first told me they were closed for lunch and would be back at 1:15pm. When I pointed out it was 1:38pm, she had me hold and then later came back and said they had rolled over their phone lines for the day and so were indeed closed! Unbelievable!!!

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. On the day that you called, we had closed early for mandatory staff training on our new electronic medical record system. We should have noted that on our voicemail and apologize for any inconvenience.

name: lewis jolly
text: Dr. Kelly and his staff are awesome.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us, Mr. Jolly. It's great to know that you are satisfied with your care.

name: Thomas Neumann
text: This office is the most unprofessional or negligent office . My wife has called the office for prescription refills with enough time to not be without  her prescription.They say give them 48 hours to make it happen. That sounds reasonable enough, but the last four times it has taken at least 4 days. She will be finding a new doctor. Please if you are dependent on medication then don't consider this office.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Neumann. We understand that our practice administrator has spoken to your wife and is working to address your concerns.

name: Core Strength & Performance (Deven & Heidi Dehnel)
text: Dr. Kelly and the nurses here are so kind, courteous and helpful. Everytime I've came they've taken to time to get to know me as well as get me in and out as far as possible. Would highly recommend this place!

name: Daniel Lee Hogan
text: They got us in quick. Were courteous. And helpful answering all our questions. You do want to call first though, they are by appointment only.

name: Dennis Skinner
text: I have been seeing Dr Marlow for 20+years he and his staff is the best. Alwas our friendly and professional.

name: Morgan Fogg
text: Other than taking a while to answer the phone this place is truly amazing!! Dr. Kelly is very nice and an awesome doctor.

name: Deirdre Mixson
text: I rarely have to visit in person because I just call in my prescriptions so I haven't been in months. Apparently their system had updated and they no longer had my insurance on file. I will say on my part I was not prepared and did not anticipate having to provide it so I expressed some frustration, BUT my major issue was that when I sighed and started asking some questions the receptionist Mary Partain cut her eyes over at the other receptionist as if I was the one being out of line. I have visited the office five or six times and have never had to show my insurance card- the reason I know this for fact because she didn't believe me is because I lost my card and haven't had a physical card for over a year because I don't go anywhere else. I did not appreciate the way she made it seem as if I was the one being inconvenienced when y'all are the ones that changed systems.

name: Michael Adams
text: This place is terrible. Slow or grumpy service. Wait times are long.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Adams. Your feedback is very important to us, and we will share your comments with our management. Please call the Practice Administrator so we can learn more about your visit and work to address your concerns. Our number is (256) 428-4900. Thank you.

name: Kaliber Imaging
text: Cited number is disconnected. It was irresponsible of HH not to have a forwarding message for at least several months. It appears people were using this clinic just a few months ago.

text: I like Dr. Williams but we getting a lady doctor there because Dr. Williams is moving to Hawaii

name: CMC
text: Since Hsv Hosp took over it's downhill all the way, will be looking elsewhere for a Dr after over 15 yrs.

name: Charlotte Parmer
text: He is the best surgeon I ever been to. He and his staff are awesome. I recommend him to anyone.

name: Starla Holley
text: I have used Dr. Nichols a few times over several years. I have never been more impressed with a surgeon as Dr. Nichols. As one other reviewer/patient said, he is old school and his bedside manners are impeccable. With my current situation, I had seen several other surgeons and I just didn’t feel completely comfortable. I feel that Dr. Nichols went above and beyond to make sure that my problem was nothing too serious. That alone, means the world. Others wanted me to just wait etc. That’s a lot of stress when you don’t know the extent of your problem. I know that when the time comes again for a surgeon, he will be my first call. Thank you Dr. Nichols AND his staff. All wonderful people. I just know that above all, he is a very compassionate and concerned person about his patients. I have recommended him over the years to friends etc and will keep doing that.

name: Maddy M
text: Just had my gallbladder removed yesterday. Doctor Nichols was very nice with an awesome bed side manner, he kept me overnight, most places discharge you the same day, he told me it was easier to tend to me if I had complications being at the hospital instead of at home  He came to check on me after the surgery and then he came in the next morning to check on my incisions and to see if I had any questions. Very wonderful man and doctor, I would highly recommend for any general surgery!

name: Lerinda Evans
text: I just had my my gallbladder removed by Dr Nichols and he did a phenomenal job. He is a old school doctor, very intelligent and compassionate. I definitely recommend him to everyone. Thank you so much for taking care of me, you are the best.

name: Eddie Cheshire
text:
My wife had surgery on July 3rd. Dr Nichols did her surgery and she was called a VIP cause she was his only surgery that day. He came in at her convenience. He also came by and checked on her the afternoon of her surgery, and checked on her at 530a.m. the next day July 4th. How many doctors do you know would do that? His bedside manners
we're incredible. I recommend him to everyone.

name: JoAnn Hodges Phillips
text: Awesomely Spectacular Surgeon & Staff! Has always taken the necessary time & effort to understand me & my medical condition(s), before making any decisions & recommendations. A rare Gem 💎 in a box 📦 of rocks, in my opinion! This is my personal opinion & experience! When it comes to healthcare, I urge everyone to be an informed consumer and/or have an advocate who can help you make important health decisions-all doctors are not the same, all facilities are the same. Be your own best judge of how you feel about the care you are receiving! And may God be with you!

name: Cyndi Jordan
text: He is the best Doctor in Dothan. I have many surgeries he has always had the best bedside manner. He is the only Doctor I trust.
